scale.$description: Source for calculating all size-related tokens (size, space, dimension). The default is 16px (=1 REM). If you change it, it will change all size-related tokens.

none.$description: Primitive borderWidth token. Do not use to tokenize a component.

xs.$description: Primitive borderWidth token. Do not use to tokenize a component.

s.$description: Primitive borderWidth token. Do not use to tokenize a component.

m.$description: Primitive borderWidth token. Do not use to tokenize a component.

l.$description: Primitive borderWidth token. Do not use to tokenize a component.
